title: Atheist Demotivator #5
author: VD
content_html: What people often seem to forget, even as the AGW/CC consensus is washed away beneath a tide of facts, observations, and public scorn, is that it doesn’t matter if it’s four men or four thousand who throw their intellectual weight behind a foolish idea. Eventually that idea is going to have to stand or fall on its own.
content_text: What people often seem to forget, even as the AGW/CC consensus is washed away beneath a tide of facts, observations, and public scorn, is that it doesn’t matter if it’s four men or four thousand who throw their intellectual weight behind a foolish idea.
